item.title: John H.'s Review of Belstaff - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: About a month ago I was on the hunt for a new jack and after looking at the website a few jackets caught my eye, and so I made my way to the Upper East Side. Walking in I was politely greeted by…

item.title: Carol K.'s Review of King Hong Restaurant - Fort Lee (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: I don't know who wrote the other reviews, but this was the most tasteless Chinese food I've ever had. Based on the reviews, I thought I'd give it a try. The delivery took 2 hours (they said 45…

item.title: Jas S.'s Review of Moti Mahal Delux - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Amazing food and exceptional service! The GM Tiku personally took care of us and we were absolutely amazed with the food. One of the best Chicken Makhni I have ever had.

item.title: Anne B.'s Review of Freddy's Food Market - New York (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: What a terrible store. Everything is about a dollar more than every other place in the neighborhood and the selection is so inconsistent that you never know what you will find. Go in one day and get…

item.title: Joanna S.'s Review of Appellation - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: This review is long overdue, having been a customer for the past few years. Whenever I go I ask for a suggestion and have been pleased with every single bottle! In addition to the wine, they have a…

item.title: Tony A.'s Review of Whynot Coffee & Wine - New York (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Corner of Christopher and Gay Streets. Great location. The big windows are good, but I was served one of the worst cups of coffee I have ever had the misfortune of purchasing. There is no excuse for…

item.title: Maya D.'s Review of Galli Restaurant - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: This place is really amaze. I am always surprised at how empty it always is considering how solid the food is. The rolls they give you to start with are one of the main reasons I come here, they are…

item.title: Rose L.'s Review of Asian Grill - East Rutherford (4/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Stopped in today to satisfy a need for dim sum. Specifically a desire for steamed and baked roast pork buns.
Desire met. Craving satisfied. Got about 5-6 different dim sums. Shu Mai was ok a…

item.title: Rebecca E.'s Review of Hunan Wok - Little Falls (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: I wouldn't say this is the Ritz, but my husband and I have always enjoyed the classic dishes we order from here, like barbecued pork ribs, pork fried rice, and General Tso's chicken. We usually get…

item.title: Preet K.'s Review of Taste Of Lahore - Jackson Heights (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: I have given this place three chances, and have gotten diarrhea each and every time. The food also took over an hour to come even though I am only three blocks away. Taste of a long, painful night.…

item.title: Cat B.'s Review of Reservoir Restaurant - South Orange (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Let me start by saying that if I could give this place no stars, I would. First, the place is dirty and very out dated and the wait staff looked bothered and annoyed at our very presence. We were…

item.title: Lesly L.'s Review of Gansevoort Meatpacking NYC - New York (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: Love the view here! The ambiance is elegant and great house music! Came here on a Friday night and there wasn't that many people but the atmosphere is still great..

item.title: Ms. Brooklyn L.'s Review of Mexicue - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Love this food. I make a trip from Brooklyn to Mexicue just to have that BBq Brisket Sandwich and roasted cream corn. I'm too old to be pregnant, but I crave this sandwich like a pregnant woman.…

item.title: Brian M.'s Review of The Way Station - Brooklyn (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: The servers are friendly enough, the drinks are almost reasonably priced & it's fun to pretend to be the Doctor while taking a shit in the TARDIS bathroom.I enjoyed the atmosphere. It's decorated…

item.title: Lisa G.'s Review of Taras Bulba - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description:
I went to this place for dinner with the family. I was very excited since my family is from Kiev/Cherkasy to try some Ukrainian food which I have grew up on.
We got a table near the back in a…

item.title: Lindsay P.'s Review of Handybook - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: My first appointment for house cleaning ended in disappointment - a cleaner who could not show up due to a personal problem - so the company sent another cleaner on a different day AND gave me a free…

item.title: Lavinia M.'s Review of Hill and Dale - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: I loved everything about this lovely restaurant. When you enter you feel as if you have stepped back in time to the roaring twenties. The décor of the restaurant is tailored to the name: Hill and…

item.title: Rinku U.'s Review of Raymond Cash, PC - Forest Hills (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: This lawyer was hired to handle a nonpayment landlord-tenant eviction case. Raymond Cash overcharges and provides inadequate services. His staff is very rude, especially Eli Acevedo the paralegal.…

item.title: Tom R.'s Review of Han Chon Food Court - Ridgefield (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: We love coming here for various authentic Korean dishes. Reasonable pricing and cafe style seating.

item.title: Aileen S.'s Review of Kimganae Korean Restaurant - Flushing (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Filling, tasty, and cheap! The dine-in area is small, but I was able to get a table pretty quickly on an early Saturday evening. Will definitely be returning. The only disappointment was that they no…

item.title: Rahul N.'s Review of Saravana Bhavan - Manhattan (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Pathetic service. The guys are outright rude, guess they feel entitled because the food tastes good.

item.title: Talia H.'s Review of Crepe Cafe Joli & Cocoa Bar - Manhattan (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Bad service and bad quality. I was disappointed to say the least.I asked for the strawberry and Nutella. It was ok, presented in a mediocre plate picked from the corner store. I ask the young man…

item.title: Katie S.'s Review of Golden Cicada Tavern - Jersey City (3/5) on Yelp
item.description:
This is a place everyone must go to once - and then again.
I have this feeling every experience will be different. From the various crowds, streaming videos on YouTube, you never know what you are…

item.title: Eichele M.'s Review of Angry Chicken - New York (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Just had my first Angry chicken meal, and it won't be the last. The meal was very tasty! The dinner comes with a whole rotisserie chicken, veggies (red & green peppers, onions, potatoes and broccoli)…

item.title: Michelle L.'s Review of Best Bagel and Coffee - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Best Bagel & Coffee literally has the best bagels (I've never had their coffee though, so I can't speak to that). My office is in the Penn Station area, right around the corner from here, and this is…
